Notes: Scheduled transactions act as programmable mitigation disbursements that ClaimOnt classifies as MitigationAction.
Recurring disbursements can finance adaptation projects that ClaimOnt models as AdaptationCommitment.
Hiero milestones evidence resilience outcomes aligned with ClaimOnt's ResilienceOutcome.
Scheduled actions cite the climate objective they advance in alignment with ClaimOnt objectives.
Impact statements document the execution of scheduled climate actions per ClaimOnt guidance.
Hiero programme milestones serve as indicators for ClaimOnt monitoring requirements.
Reporting windows on scheduled actions map to ClaimOnt reporting period semantics.
